means: 副交感神经，副交感神经系统

word_mean: 副交感神经：自主神经系统中由眼、延髓和骶部三个部分组成的那一部分，见system项下
副交感神经的：有副交感神经的，或副交感神经所有的

sentence.Network_en: The heart is innervated by both sympathetic and parasympathetic fibers.
sentence.Network_cn: 心脏受交感神经纤维和副交感神经纤维的支配.

sentence.Network_en: The parasympathetic innervation of the heart originates in the medulla oblongata.
sentence.Network_cn: 支配心脏的副交感神经发源于延髓的迷走神经核.

sentence.Network_en: Some parasympathetic fibers innervate the vertricular blood vessels.
sentence.Network_cn: 某些副交感神经纤维支配心室的血管.

Dennis Coon在他的书中对这个实验的解释是副交感神经反弹(Parasympathetic rebound)致死。一般在应激状态下,人会激活交感神经系统,并分泌皮质醇和儿茶酚胺类压抑副交感.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from para- 'alongside' + sympathetic, because some of these nerves run alongside sympathetic nerves

means.word_mean: 1. originates in the brain stem and lower part of the spinal cord; opposes physiological effects of the sympathetic nervous system: stimulates digestive secretions; slows the heart; constricts the pupils; dilates blood vessels
1. of or relating to the parasympathetic nervous system
